GeoQuiz <<<<<<< Updated upstream =======
>>>>>>> Stashed changes Canberra is the capital of Australia. The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean. The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean. The source of the Nile River is in Egypt. The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas. Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
Cal Poly Pomona has the largest campus among all Cal States. Cal State Maritime Academy has the smallest campus among all Cal States There are 3 Cal Polys in the CSU system. Cal Poly Pomona is ranked #1 for Social Mobility. The sheep on CPP are apart of the BEEF unit. Cal Poly Pomona has their own ice cream!.
